column2: This is a Math-o-mir language definition file, you can define strings displayed
in the Math-o-mir application by editing this file. The file should reside in
Math-o-mir application directory. Keep this file plain text, non-unicode.
Each line starting with semicolon is a comment.
Lines starting with numbers are defintions, the number is the ID that must not be changed
Please change only text under quotation marks. Take care that the lenght of the
translated text doesn't differ much from the original english text.
* Following section defines the main menu text
--Access Locked objects--- (this option enables you to access even object that are locked)
--Copy equation image \t F9-- (copies equation image into clipboard)
--Save equation image \t F8-- (saves equation image to disk)
--Copy LaTeX code \t F6--  (Copes LaTeX code into clipboard)
--Halftone rendering-- (wheter halftoning is used when equation images are created)

column1: 32894,"Hold right button to toggle the mouse-wheel function"
column2: --Hold right button to toggle the mouse-wheel function-- ***TRANSLATE***
--Zooming with mouse wheel adjusts pointer-- (wheter mouse pointer is automatically repositioned on zoom)

column1: 32862,"Benutze ALT+D,B,A für Zugriff auf das Menü"

column2: --Use F1 to set zoom level to 100%--
* Following section defines text displayed in context menus
******* guidelines/ruller menu - activated by right click to the ruller ********
*************** text search menu - activated from Edit->Find text ****************
*************** Context menu options for hand-drawings and selections ***********
--Condition list:-- (section with commands that define condition list elements)
--Symbol:"-- (section with commands to define symbol apereance [sum,prod,integral...])
--Brackets:-- (section with commands that define brackets formatting)
--Exclude left/top-- (to exclude left or top bracket)
--Exclute right/bottom-- (to exclude right or bottom bracket)
--Large-- (brackets are always as high the highest element inside them)
--B. contents:--  (section with commands to modify brackets content formatting)
--Expand outside-- (new insertion points are to be added outside brackets)
--Condense outside-- (insertion points outside brackets are to be removed)
--Font:-- (section with commands to define font formatting)
--Has index-- (button that defines if a variable has index or not)
--Table lines:-- (section that defines table/matrix borderlines and inter-lines)	**NEW!**
--Single line border-- (button that puts single-line borderline)
--Double line border-- (button that puts double-line borderline)
--No lines-- (button that removes inter-lines, that is lines between cells)
--Line type:-- (section that defines single line of table/matrix)
--Cell alignment:-- (section that defines text alignment for table/matrix cells)
****************** context menu options for symbolic computation *******************
--Corrected:"-- (after a syntax error is corrected in an equation)
--Sum of array:"-- (result of summation of an array of values)

column1: 2007,"Durchschnitt:"	--Average:-- (average value of an array of values)

column2: --Easycast..-- (Not to be traslated for latin-written languages)
* Following section defines UNDO information text - text written behind the 'Undo'
* word in the main menu (for example 'Undo font formating' or 'Undo delete').
******* operations with hand drawings and multi-object selections (from context menu) *********
--add centerpoint-- (center point to an circle is added, see also ID 590)
--make dashed-- (line is made dashed, see also ID 591)
--dash-dot-- (line is made dash-dot-dash-, see also ID 592)
--add arrows-- (arrows are added to a line, see also ID 595)
--add grid lines-- (coordinate grid is added, see ID 594)
--close path-- (an open line was closed, see ID 593)
--delete-- (after an object or its part was deleted, see ID 2 and ID 501)
--line width-- (after line width is changed, see IDs 502,503,504,566,577)
--break apart-- (after a drawing is broken apart, see ID 513)
--combine-- (after two drawing are combined into one, see ID 514)
--v. distribution-- (after objects are vertically distributed, see ID 578)
--align-- (after objects are aligned, see IDs 560...565 and 579)
--mirror-- (after objects are mirrored, see IDs 535 and 536)
--size-- (after objects are resized, see IDs 517..522 and 527..532)
************* operations with math and text objects (from context menu) *****************
--decoration-- (after decoration was changed, see IDs 3..7 and 130)
--pick up-- (after an object is picked up, see ID 1)
--delete-- (after an object is deleted, see ID 2)
--vertical-- (after an object is vertically oriented, see ID 93)
--expanding-- (after an object is expanded/condensed outside, see IDs 94 and 95)
--alignment-- (after an multi-line object is aligned, see IDs 90, 91 and 92)
--symbol height-- (after height of symbols sum/prod/integral is changed, see IDs 50 to 52)
--font size-- (after font size is changed, see IDs 45..48 and 55..56)
--parentheses format-- (after brackets are modified, see IDs 30...39, 57..58)
--indeks remove-- (after index is removed, see IDs 19,21)
--index add-- (after index is added, see IDs 19,21)
--convert to function-- (after a variable is converted to function, see ID 20)
--converto to variable-- (ater a function or unit is converted to variable, see IDs 22 and 27)
--convert to unit-- (after a variable is converted to unit, see ID 23)
--font formatting-- (after font formating is changed, see IDs 14..18 and 24..25)
--command entry-- (after a command, like \sin, is casted)
--insert into-- (after an object is inserted to the cursor position, for example a toolbox was clicked)
--del key-- (after the Del key is used to delete something)
--backspace key-- (after the backspace key is used to delete something)
--keyboard implanting-- (after an keyboard implanting operation was used)
--Enter key-- (afte the Enter key was hit)
--exponent enty-- (after exponent is inserted, by using '^' key)
--index entry-- (after index is inserted, by using '_' key)
--text conversion-- (automatic conversion to text after several text characters were entered)
--convert to function-- (after the dot key is hit)
--erase drawing-- (the eraser tool was used to erase part of drawing)
--insert new-- (new object was inserted into the document by mouse)
--move-- (an object or selection was moved by mouse)
--drawing-- (when some drawing is created by mouse)
--cut selection-- (a 'cut' command or Ctrl+X is used from the main menu)
--table formatting-- (changed borderlines or alignment of table cells. See IDs 601..655)
* Following section defines text in various dialog boxes and message boxes
--Time elapsed!\\\\Save your work-- (time for an exam elapsed. Use \\ for new line)
--Time limited exam.\\\\Minutes left:-- (prewarning during exam taking)
--Edit-- (for the bitmap menu - editing a bitmap)
--Load-- (for the bitmap menu - loading a bitmap)
--Update-- (fot the bitmap menu - refreshing a bitmap after edited in an external tool)
--Insert Into Toolbox-- (when insertiong new objects into toolbox, ater right-mouse click)
--Per-character font settings-- (title caption for mixed font formatting table)   ***TRANSLATE***
--Alter all-- (to define all per-character fonts at once)  ***TRANSLATE***

column1: 5506, "Kennwort wird zum Öffnen der PrÖfungsergebnisse genutzt"
column2: --Password is used to open exam results"--
********************** Toolbox and toolbar help (use \\ to insert new line)****************************
--Typing mode-- (mouse pointer hovers above typing-mode button)
--Line wrap-- (mouse pointer hovers above line-wrap button)
--Insert column-- (mouse pointer hovers above insert-column button)
--Insert row-- (mouse pointer hovers above insert-row button)
--Uniform\\font casting-- (mouse pointer hovers above unifrom font casting button)
--Mixed\\font casting-- (mouse pointer hovers above mixed font casting button)
--Freehand-- (mouse pointer hovers above freehand drawing tool button)
--Rectangle-- (mouse pointer hovers above rectangle drawing tool button)
--Line-- (mouse pointer hovers above line drawing tool button)
--Ellipse-- (mouse pointer hovers above ellipse drawing tool button)
--Eraser-- (mouse pointer hovers above eraser tool button)
--Section\\line-- (mouse pointer hovers above section-line drawing tool button)
--Drawing box-- (mouse pointer hovers above drawing-box tool button)
--Function\\plotter-- (mouse pointer hovers above function-plotter tool button)
--Bitmap box-- (mouse pointer hovers above bitmap-box tool button)
--Drawing-- (an icon from toolbar to select various drawing tools)    ***TRANSLATE***
--Headline-- (an icon from toolbar to convert text box into a headline 'H')  ***TRANSLATE***
--Arrow-- (mouse pointer hovers above the arrow drawing tool button)         ***TRANSLATE***
--Double dot-- (variable decoration in the text control-box)		   ***TRANSLATE***
--more...-- (mouse pointer hovers above a triangle that opens subtoolbox)
--Virtual\\keyboard-- (mouse pointer hovers above triangle that opens the virtual keyboard - 'M' toolbox option)
--Text-- (first line of the "Text mode" button label - the text-control box)
--mode-- (second line of the "Text mode" button label - the text-control box)
--Math-- (first line of the "Math mode" button label - the text-control box)
--mode-- (second line of the "Math mode" button label - the text-control box)
--place into main menu-- (mouse pointer hovers above a triangle that trasfers the item into the main toolbox)   ***TRANSLATE***
--black color-- (pointing at the black color option in the colorbox)  ***TRANSLATE***
--Saving...-- (when Ctrl+S is used to save document)
--Snap to grid OFF-- (when grid is switched off - F11)
--Snap to grid ON-- (when grid is switched on - F11)
--Guidelines OFF-- (when guidelines are switched off - F12)
--Guidelines ON-- (when guidelines are switcheed on - F12)
--Presentation mode is active (F5 to toggle)-- (when user tries to edit an equation while the presentation mode is active)
--Edit mode-- (when edit mode is switched on - F5)
--Presentation mode-- (when presentation mode is switched on - F5)
